description:
11:00 is a puzzle game where the player must solve puzzles to reach new levels and stories. Remember though, everything in the game has a connection with 11:00.

Controls: 

- WASD = Move

- Space = Jump

- E = Interact

- Mouse = Look

Download Instructions:

If your PC tries to block the game, press the button labelled 'More Info' this will give you a new button that will say 'Run Anyway'. Click that button and the game will now load up and play :)
